name: kittenboat
description:
created for Sylvie's Jam #1 in 15 hours (over 2 weeks because i procrastinated lol)

you are a kitten and sometimes you are in a boat.  

go fishing to gain money to satisfy your gacha overlords buy cute hats!  

that you cannot wear.  because you are a kitten.  

be wary, for the oceans are rough and dangerous, and you are a cat who is not very good at controlling a boat.  if your boat crashes into a rock, you have to repair it by completing a tile puzzle, before the jellyfish comes for you...

includes amazing features such as:

  • a cute kitten :3
  • gacha/lootbox* for hats that do absolutely nothing.  can you get the rare hat??
  • a fishing minigame.   every game needs one of those.
  • the fish icon covers up the last part of the progress bar so you think you've caught a fish but you're really just 98% of the way there and then you hit a rock
  • tank controls!
  • a lot of tile puzzles.
  • default unity UI
  • instructions straight out of an early 2000s flash game
  • if you click around the shop you might find the secret cheating button that just gives you money for free

...and even more nothing!

  • there is no sound
  • there is no settings menu
  • there isn't even an exit game button welcome to purrgatory

you will not like this game.  unless you really like tile puzzles idk then maybe you'll like it.

*disclaimer: because this gacha can actually give you nothing, or even take some money away, it is more akin to a slot machine than a lootbox.   this doesn't actually matter because there are no ingame transactions please don't sue me.

design, programming, and art by angeleen tan

(the suggested donation is a joke number, you do not need to pay me money for this...thing.)

special thanks to:

ryan kain for maintaining what remains of my sanity

noodle the cat for cameoing 

---

thank you for reading the most unhinged game description i have ever written.

--- 

known bugs:

-sometimes the puzzle is just literally unsolvable

-the fishing hook might sometimes be barely inside the target and not increase fishing meter

-sometimes you spawn inside a rock
